verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A Psalm of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. The <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%>, that there is no <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> before his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
For he <S%H2505>flattereth<s%> himself in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, until his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> to be <S%H8130>hateful<s%>.
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are <S%H205>iniquity<s%> and <S%H4820>deceit<s%>: he hath left <S%H2308>off<s%> to be <S%H7919>wise<s%>, and to do <S%H3190>good<s%>.

He <S%H2803>deviseth<s%> <S%H205>mischief<s%> upon his <S%H4904>bed<s%>; he <S%H3320>setteth<s%> himself in a <S%H1870>way<s%> that is not <S%H2896>good<s%>; he <S%H3988>abhorreth<s%> not <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
Thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, is in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; and thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> reacheth unto the <S%H7834>clouds<s%>.

Thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> is like the <S%H410>great<s%> <S%H2042>mountains<s%>; thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8415>deep<s%>: O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thou <S%H3467>preservest<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%>.

How <S%H3368>excellent<s%> is thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>! therefore the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> put their <S%H2620>trust<s%> under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of thy <S%H3671>wings<s%>.

They shall be abundantly <S%H7301>satisfied<s%> with the <S%H1880>fatness<s%> of thy <S%H1004>house<s%>; and thou shalt make them <S%H8248>drink<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> of thy <S%H5730>pleasures<s%>.
For with thee is the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>: in thy <S%H216>light<s%> shall we <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H216>light<s%>.
O <S%H4900>continue<s%> thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> unto them that <S%H3045>know<s%> thee; and thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
Let not the <S%H7272>foot<s%> of <S%H1346>pride<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> against me, and let not the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5110>remove<s%> me.
There are the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%>: they are cast <S%H1760>down<s%>, and shall not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H6965>rise<s%>.
